website_summaries.verdict: Above-average processing speed and performance with its Intel Core i3 CPU.
pros: Built-in support for 4K video and graphics
Pulls power over its USB-C port, reducing the number of cables you need

customer_reviews.title: Low maintenance browser machine
customer_reviews.text: My wife has Parkinson's disease and I bought this chromebox for her to use to shop online, email, stream video and Facebook. This is my second Chrome OS device. It works great, setup was simple and it loads video and websites very fast. The best thing is that I don't have to deal with fixing a Windows 10 update and virus protection and "cleaning" is a simple "Powerwash" away. As a Google fan, this works with my Gmail, Google Docs, Google Drive, Google Photos, and Pixel 3XL phone flawlessly. A perfect low maintenance home computer.
customer_reviews.author: D. Price

customer_reviews.title: Return or risk keeping
customer_reviews.text: The N018U is my 2nd Chromebox, replacing the M004U purchased in Oct 2015, and which worked no problems until one day the ChromeOS went missing and or needed repair and which recovery efforts failed. I've only had this Chromebox 3 since November 2018, and no problems until this past week when twice it "froze up" forcing a disconnect from power source to shut it off. It is working now, and hasn't crashed since, but I've read a good number of comments that this is a problem other Chromebox owners have faced.
customer_reviews.author: eieio

customer_reviews.title: Just like my last Chromebox except more powerful
customer_reviews.text: Just like my last Chromebox except more powerful. My office has Windows machines which are currently out of service due to software problems, but our 2 chromeboxes are absolutely reliable - and for someone who does business online - that is what I need. Not pretty just effective!
customer_reviews.author: Allan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Homeschool parent approved
customer_reviews.text: I am a homeschool parent. This year both laptops began to have issues. I decided to look for options for desktops. After doing a lot of research, I decided on these. These are the perfect size for their desk. My kids only need online access for the most part. I highly recommend these to anyone who needs something for school. You can add the Microsoft app and get online access to Word, PowerPoint, or whatever you need. I highly recommend these to any parents looking for an alternative option than a bulky desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Billie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a Chromebook for years and I absolutely love it so, when my desktop Windows computer crashed from Blue Screen of Death, I decided to go for a Chromebox. It's been about four months and, so far, this computer is fast and efficient and does everything I need it for do.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Donihue

customer_reviews.title: Go chrome or go home :)
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I've had all flavors of windows, Apple, Linux, and now Chromebooks and I'm not sure I'll ever use anything else! Crazy fast, super convenient platform, and the ease of use is simply unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Neil C. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a DYI home conferencing system for COVID. It has exceeded every expectation -- drives a 4k 43" TV like a champ. Processor is plenty fast for running ChromeOS and video conferencing.
customer_reviews.author: G. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine especially for Google Ecosystem
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my office front desk because we essentially run on the Google ecosystem (Google Drive, Docs, Gmail, etc.) No issues so far. Very quick to boot up and no lag when in use.
customer_reviews.author: James Mulholland

customer_reviews.title: i3 Chromebox. Great performance
customer_reviews.text: This product is superb for my AV system application. Very quiet and fast. Works with all the peripherals I already have from the PC world!! Very Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Welch

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine, but quite noisy and I find it annoying.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Does the simple tasks.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice alternative. I can tell that the software is no different from the laptops with touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin A.

customer_reviews.title: Lack of software
customer_reviews.text: It's alright there are a lot of things the chrome os will have to add to be a complete replacement for PC or Mac
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Google Chrome Computer
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a computer that was fast, easy to use, and didn't update a lot. I had a Windows, but I couldn't stand all the updates that it did. I just needed something to surf the web, log onto Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube. It works extremely well for that purpose. Another plus is that it is really small. It fits on a shelf behind my monitor and takes up very little room. The Chrome browser is very fast and it boots up in about 15 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Kratz

product_meta.title: ASUS CHROMEBOX 3-N018U Mini PC with Intel Core i3, 4K UHD Graphics and Power Over Type C Port, Star Gray
product_meta.description: Style:N018UPowered by Intel Core i3, the ASUS Chromebox 3 delivers a perfect balance of desktop performance with the latest in connectivity options. Use your favorite Google Play apps across platforms and on multiple displays with DisplayPort over powered Type C. Stream your favorite content over Gigabit LAN or 802.11ac Wi-Fi.
feature_bullets: CHROMEBOX 3-N018U features an 7th Generation Intel Core i3-7100U processor with 4GB DDR4 memory, Gigabit LAN, 802.11ac Wi-Fi and 32GB M.2 SATA SSD
Full support of Android Apps from Google Play on Chrome OS
Integrated Intel 4K UHD graphics supports 2x Monitors using HDMI and DisplayPort over Type C for compatibility with legacy display connections like VGA and DVI
Share files or stream your favorite media with Intel 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.2, and USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type A & Type C ports
Power over Type C minimizes cable clutter and delivers power to monitors, projectors, and mobile devices

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars299 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
